instructions: Jay December 18, 2011 at 1:48 am I do not think so. you can use pc speakers for phone, but does not seems possible to use phone as a pc speaker. SomeX June 22, 2012 at 5:44 pm yes you can, on the top left corner, click browse, and at the top click (Play on phone beta )!!! Anonymous December 17, 2011 at 10:59 pm I have done a few searches but can not find much, Is there a specific reason need it set up that way? It was my impression that even the best media phone do not have great speakers in them, and would not be good as a PC speaker. I use a wireless stereo headset for my phone because, in my opinion, the volume on mine sucks so bad. Anonymous December 17, 2011 at 10:19 pm Most phones are only bluetooth masters, cannot act as devices Maybe with Gmote. http://www.gmote.org/ It allows you to browse your PC for media and can select to play it from either the PC or through the phone speakers, via Wifi??
